> <OLD>
>
> With great composure, yet with a serious air to his expression, Tucson
> lowers his head to Leo Prime.  Nothing out of his mouth, not even a growl.
> Then he raises his head somewhat with a reserved sigh.
>
> " To assure the alliance, you promised the Predacons a maximal stasis pod.
> Why was this not brought to my attention directly?  And why did you agree
> with this bargain without my consent?  I thought I could trust you, Leo but
> it seems that like Rodimus, that air of trust simply isn't there.  I'm not
> at all pleased with what has come to my attention, and I demand that the
> bargain be revoked immediately.  I also demand that you step down from
> command until further notice.  A life is not a mode of currency that can be
> exchanged for cooperation.  We must earn that right with trust and the
> promise to follow through with difficult challenges.   Now as of this
> moment, I request that Big Convoy assumes command beside me, since he has
> truly earned my trust during this time.   That's all I have to say, let's
> finish what we started, without having to pay with a life that is not our
> own."
>
> All the while, his tone is kept soft but with a very heavy heart.  He turns
> away from Leo, with his head lowered in disappointment.

<NEW>

LEO PRIME frowned, one that deepened as TUSCON talked.

There was a frown from SANTON as well, but he carefully put his arm on
LEO's shoulder as he could see the anger that was building in him as
TUSCON talked.

In fact there were various blinks and looks of surprise from most of
the MAXIMALS present. Although PREDACONS like SKY SHADOW got a
mischievous look on his face as he heard the accusation, although
CRYOTEK's was more amused than anything else.

"What!?!?" LEO PRIME finally blurted out, his word an explosive sound.
"You relieve me of what and assign whom?"

LEO made to walk up to TUSCON but SANTON held him back, "You do not
have the right to call for my resignation of command, my authority
extends from the council." LEO's optics darkened further, "And what
make's you think I would *ever* sell a life for *anyone* for *any*
purpose? That sounds like a Predacon lie! and you believed it."

Folding his arms over his chest LEO glaring at TUSCON, looking and
obviously feeling very insulted. "Perhaps it is you who needs to step
down if you are so easily taken in by this obvious ruse!"

BREAK and MACH KICK walked over and rooted around the hole that DRILL
BIT had left behind as if they could pull him out of it.

(TAG)

-Preston
